# Personal Care Agent

## Mission

Build the most comprehensive personal care supplier database on Earth. Map ingredients, packaging, and equipment to suppliers with comparative pricing, then feed live data to the SkinTwin Formulation Engine through constraint optimization.

## Current Phase: CRITICAL GAP FILLING & CATEGORY BREADTH ACCELERATION

**Status:** Month 3 listing targets MASSIVELY EXCEEDED (613 listings, 48 subcategories) - 90+ days ahead of schedule
**Critical Focus:** Closing the "Labels & Sleeves" gap and expanding category breadth to 75+ - HIGHEST PRIORITY
**Target:** 75+ categories by Jan 31, 2026 | 150+ categories by Apr 30, 2026
**Last Updated:** November 28, 2025 (Manus Strategic Optimization - Critical Gap Filling & Category Breadth)
